About

Sleek is a modern Jekyll theme focused on speed performance & SEO best practices. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com or simply read the guide on how to get started

You can find the source code for the Jekyll new theme at: sleek

You can find the source code for Jekyll at jekyll
